MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Greenbank Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:03pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35pm on 8th January 2021.
